We + Make

Creating sustainable digital solutions

Running your organization is hard without the right people. Bob & Sarah, the brains behind We + Make, work with business around the world to create intuitive, effective, and sustainable solutions.

Bob enjoys tweeting about user experience & taking photos. Sarah specializes in helping the indiginous communities of South America understand technology, enjoys writing, & teaching English abroad.

Both of us enjoy traveling full-time in our custom RV mobile office.

For collaboration or questions;
